last_episode_to_air.name: Legacy Contact
last_episode_to_air.overview: Everyone must return to Paxos, where old feelings arise as secrets and lies mount. Demosthenes isn't willing to give up — and no one is safe.

name: Maestro in Blue
overview: A musician goes to lead a festival on a scenic island, where he begins an unexpected romance and finds himself entwined in other people's problems.

seasons.name: Season 1
seasons.overview: A musician goes to lead a festival on a scenic island, where he begins an unexpected romance and finds himself entwined in other people's problems.

seasons.name: Season 2
seasons.overview: The consequences of a murder soon spread from the island of Paxos to Athens, forcing everyone to face their secrets and seek the truth — or hide it.

episodes.name: Clair De Lune
episodes.overview: Orestis arrives in Paxos to organize a music festival at the request of Fanis, whose daughter is quickly smitten with Orestis despite their age gap.

episodes.name: Denial
episodes.overview: Concerned about his mayoral run, Fanis worries that his son and Spyros are lovers. But Klelia and Antonis discover Fanis has a secret.

episodes.name: The Prayer
episodes.overview: Haralambos is in on Fanis' illegal activity and presses him for a raise. Antonis comes out to his parents — and Kielia drops a bombshell of her own.

episodes.name: The Great Chimera
episodes.overview: Klelia's parents approve of her new boyfriend, but then she uses him as a cover to sneak off to Corfu. Haralambos makes a play for Spyros' girlfriend.

episodes.name: The Family
episodes.overview: Fanis tries to present a united family front as he runs for mayor. Klelia expresses her feelings for Orestis. Maria knows who hit Gianna.

episodes.name: Musical Chairs
episodes.overview: Paxos gets a surprise visitor, throwing Klelia into despair. When Fanis discovers who Alexandra is, he tells Orestis to stay away from his daughter.

episodes.name: A Rough Guy... Is Sinking
episodes.overview: Klelia meets Alexandra, who has moved in with Orestis. Spyros and Antonis meet in Athens, but their happiness is short-lived.

episodes.name: Autoimmune Diseases
episodes.overview: Fanis tells Orestis he wants him to leave town after the festival. A depressed Spyros fights with Gianna, who is later stalked by Haralambos.

episodes.name: Love Me Do
episodes.overview: At the height of the music festival, the islanders turn cold toward Orestis. After a shocking event, he makes a big decision.

1.name: Season 1
1.overview: A musician goes to lead a festival on a scenic island, where he begins an unexpected romance and finds himself entwined in other people's problems.

episodes.name: Mother
episodes.overview: The island is profoundly shaken by tragedy and each family copes in its own way. In Athens, Alexandra waits for someone to join her.

episodes.name: Jungle
episodes.overview: Klelia commits to achieving her dream with the help of a lively new friend. Antonis tries to distract himself, but his mind plays tricks on him.

episodes.name: Post-trauma
episodes.overview: Orestis notices that Alexandra struggles with a big change. While moving on, Antonis falls into a trap that pushes him to make amends.

episodes.name: Toxic
episodes.overview: When Klelia tells Thanos what happened at the music school, he raises doubts about her behavior. Maria has a plan, but she needs Haris' help.

episodes.name: Therapy
episodes.overview: Orestis and Klelia hit dead ends. Spyros tries to talk straight with Gianna. A nosy arrival on the island triggers concern.

episodes.name: Legacy Contact
episodes.overview: Everyone must return to Paxos, where old feelings arise as secrets and lies mount. Demosthenes isn't willing to give up — and no one is safe.

2.name: Season 2
2.overview: The consequences of a murder soon spread from the island of Paxos to Athens, forcing everyone to face their secrets and seek the truth — or hide it.
